description: A B1 file is a compressed archive file created with the free file compression utility B1 Free Archiver. It may contain one or more compressed files and folders that can be decompressed/expanded back to original form using the same B1 Free Archiver. B1 files are small in size due to compression and are easy to transfer over internet. B1 Free Archiver is cross platform and is available for Windows, Linux and MacOS platforms.
It provides the option to encrypt archives with password protection, using AES-256 encryption to secure files.

instructions:
To open or extract .b1 files, you can use:

B1 Free Archiver (primary tool for creating and opening .b1 files)Other Compression Tools: Some tools like WinRAR or 7-Zip may partially support .b1, though B1 Free Archiver is recommended for full compatibility.
